instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
Hi. MacBook looks perfect, no water, no drop, nothing bad on motherboard. I've tried DFU, no luck (Dfu starts up but doesn't help). Processor heats up.

L9060 - 2.5v
L7670 - 5.1v
L7690 - 3.3v
L7030 - 12.6v
L7400 - 1.8v
L7230  - 0v, 0.3 ohm
L7220 - 0v, 0.3 ohm
L7210 - 0v, 0.3 ohm
L8100 - 1.1v
L8410 - 0v 270 kohm

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
Compare resistance to ground on CPU coils with good board.

Check L7701 voltage and all outputs from page 66 too.

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
Unfortunately, I don't have the same motherboard.

L7701 - 1.8v
P3V3_G3H 3.3v
P3V3G3S_EN 1.7v
PP3V3_G3S 3.3V
PP1V8_G3S - 1.8v
[B]P1V05_VCCST_EN - 3.3 v[/B]
PP1V05_PCH_CPU - 0.98v
PP1V05_S0_VCCSTG - 1v
VCCST_EN_C 3.3v
PP1V05_PCH_CPU - 1v
VCCST_OVERRIDE_3V3 - 3.3
PP1V1_S0SW_CPU_VCCPLL_OC 1v
PP1V8_S0SW_CPU 1.8v
PP1V8_S3_FET_R - 1.8v
[B]P1V1_S3_EN 3.3v[/B]
PP3V3_G3SSW_SNS 0v
P3V3SEN_SS 0v
SENSOR_PWR_EN - 0v

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
Don't make confusion between a power rail and its enable signal!

What error do you get on DFU?
SSD voltages try to appear?

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
Tried revive 2x. Seems to complete, there is no error message,  a reboot and a lock symbol on the bad device's DFU icon. CPU still no volt.
P1V8SSD_SW0 1.8V 
P0V9SSD_SW0 0.9v 
PPVCC_NAND_SSD0 2.5v
PPVCCQ_ANI_SSD0 1.8v

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
I suspect bad CPU.
Check if L8150 gets voltage too.

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message:
Is it a bad CPU ?
Is it worth rebalancing the CPU ?

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message: If CPU is really shorted on its core power, must be changed, not reballed.

threads.title: 820-01958-a 20v no display
threads.message: Is there anything else that can be done ?
